name: Alien Worker
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Penguin Hatchery] improvement <by consuming this unit>

civilopediaText.text: These are the runts of the litter, cast aside to do menial labour. While all Aliens are too weak to hold a shovel (to build farms) or an axe (to chop trees), these guys are even too wimpy to hold a Phaser. The only honour bestowed on them is the permission to sacrifice themselves as penguin food.
These raygun-toting, maniacally grinning, sequins-wearing Aliens come in peace! Or they blast you to pieces. Damn if I know which it is.
